channel.title: Cant run client(64 bit issuse) NEED HELP!
channel.description:
hi everyone... im having an issue running my client... i know the reason why.. just i cant figure out how to fix it my computer is a 64-bit.. so i need a 64-bit batch file... but i cant figure out how to do it correctly this is what my batch file says:
@echo off TITLE Run JAVA -Xmx500m client 0 0 highmem members 0 pause
i just cant seem to figure it out :(, any help is much appreciated!

item.title: Cant run client(64 bit issuse) NEED HELP!
item.description:
@1980 wrote:

what you wanna put in for your batch file instead of whats there is this

@echo off
cls
“C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jre6\bin\java.exe” -Xmx500m -cp .;Theme.jar
Gui
exit
pause

Read full topic
item.source: Cant run client(64 bit issuse) NEED HELP!

item.title: Cant run client(64 bit issuse) NEED HELP!
item.dc:creator: @Javafire Javafire
item.description:
@Javafire wrote:

So far the only really good solution is to get virtualbox and install windows xp on it, then you can share folders ect. I’m making a tutorial on it right now.

Read full topic
